channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Larger crater/pothole, 31st March
item.description:
Larger crater/pothole on junction to Thirlestaine Road. This is one of many on this road and it is a disgrace. Very poor road condition near the school too. Has been awful for some time. Please sort!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thirlestaine Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -FW6 Potholes problem, 31st March
item.description:
Pothole FW 600mm x 600mm x 25mm Give and take TM Lamp Column 1 Wheelbarrow required (FW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -FW6 Potholes problem, 31st March
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed footway pothole 300x300x25mm tarmac patch required stats required (FW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 31st March
item.description:
Series of potholes/previous repairs breaking up; carriageway is sunken/grooved. Vibrations from passing vehicles affecting surrounding properties. Estimate damaged section to be in excess of 15-20ft; one pothole appears to be around the depth of a tennis ball.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 31st March
item.description:
There is an unmarked pothole on the corner of Laxton Road, by number 12. see photo.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 31st March
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed footway cracks an gaps by edging stones 3400x100x30mm tarmac patch required (FW6 Cracks or Gaps)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing issue with pot hole. Patching up small areas of it is not working!!!!, 31st March
item.description:
Pot hole directly of number 4 and 5â€™s drive way is failing once again.. last fix was only a patch of small areas. My car is being damaged once again by the stones flying up from it. Needs totally resurfacing!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 105, Village Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Orchard Way, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham

item.title: Smell, 30th March
item.description:
There is a smell on Jersey Avenue that has been present since October. Smells like sewage, so a drain must be blocked.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Jersey Avenue, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury

item.title: 2 very large potholes on Badgerworth Lane near junction for the Readings, 30th March
item.description:
There are 2 very large pot holes that are hard to avoid if traffic is coming in the opposite direction. Would also be hard to see in the dark and are right where the passenger side tyres ago. They are situated after the railway bridge just before the junction for The Readings when driving from Churchdown to Cheltenham.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
